categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Khaaza'k was a Rebel Lambda-class T-4a shuttle that ferried the captain of the Mon Calamari Star Cruiser Maximus after it was crippled and abandoned before its destruction.
The Khaaza'k and other transports carrying crew from the Maximus docked with the Nebulon-B frigate Anvil.
